title: CryptoHFs
author: CryptoHFs
created_time: April 03, 2023, 06:42:19 PMLast edit: April 03, 2023, 07:11:15 PM by CryptoHFs
content: wanted to ask if it ever worth paying for https://www.lostbitcoins.org/are they trusted?did anyone ever success cracking one of their wallets?if you ever experienced purchasing from them please write your experienceAlso, if you ever get in any of these wallets with huge amount after purchasing it from them.. you may face a legal suit to refund the funds once you access them?Also for sure they try to crack first and if failed and looked impossible they sell, that means all wallets for sale are almost impossible to crack? as they for sure won't offer without giving it a try firstplease advicethanks

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: If you're talking about buying "a wallet with lost password": that's a scam. Wallets can be faked. Don't waste your time and money on it.

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on April 03, 2023, 07:26:55 PMIf you're talking about buying "a wallet with lost password": that's a scam. Wallets can be faked. Don't waste your time and money on it.no way to figure its a real wallet or fake and just missing the password?

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on April 03, 2023, 07:32:37 PMno way to figure its a real wallet or fake and just missing the password?Lol. Don't be naive.
